title: Rebekah Vardy returns to Instagram with new added 49K followers after Coleen Rooney scandal
text:

Rebekah Vardy returned to Instagram after she went to war with Coleen Rooney.

The pregnant WAG, 37, has already got 49,000 new followers in the wake of the Wagatha Christie scandal.

Coleen accused Rebekah's Instagram account of leaking false stories to the newspapers - something Becky vehemently has denied being a part of again and again.

The WAG married to Wayne Rooney set a cunning trap to see which account was watching all her Instagram Story content.

Now the I'm A Celeb star has made her comeback to social media after maintaining silence on her Instagram.

(Image: Getty Images)

The TV personality, who is married to Foxes player Jamie Vardy, paid tribute to the late Leicester City chairman Vichai Srivaddhanaprabha.

She commented "always" with a blue heart emoji.

It is a year since the chairman passed away in a helicopter crash.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Getty Images)

It comes after claims Becky is set to earn mega-bucks from the so-called Wagatha Christie affair after boosting her Instagram following in the wake of her showdown with Coleen.

Pregnant Becky has returned home to the UK after cutting short her holiday in Dubai following the scandal.

And she could cash in on Britain's favourite Twitter spat now she's got herself a brand new fanbase.

A social media expert revealed the influx of new followers means Becky is well-placed to start cashing in.

"Becky could command around £1,500 to £2,000 per post before this row. Now that figure will be £2,000 to £2,500 and looks likely to go higher the longer this row rumbles on," they told the Daily Star .

"The more followers she attracts, the more she could earn from promoting products on her account.’"
description: Becky has made a comeback to social media as she shares her first Instagram story with her new 49,000 followers
